isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - FUEL INJECTOR(S) (ELECTRONIC ENGINES); R & R AND/OR REPLACE

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: FUEL INJECTOR(S) (ELECTRONIC ENGINES); R & R AND/OR REPLACE
wtsproc.config: It is not necessary to open the air conditioning system if equipped.

step1.para: Install wheel chocks and open hood.
Disconnect battery to ground cable, include ECM ground.
Remove engine housing cover, include remove or reposition seat, shifter lever, cup holder, trim and floor mat as necessary.
Remove charge air cooler outlet hose at valve cover and cooler. Cap open ports.
Disconnect surge tank hose (overflow), include disconnect coolant level sensor connector at tank and wire from hose.
Remove air conditioning compressor assembly if applicable and secure out of way. Include disconnect harness connector from clutch, compressor belt and support clamps.
Disconnect engine wiring and connectors to include MAP, ICP and injector wiring at valve cover and secure out of way.

note.para: Remove engine harness from plastic clip on left front of valve cover.

step1.para: Disconnect alternator wiring at alternator and valve cover, including support clamps and secure out of way.
Remove alternator wiring support bracket from valve cover.
Disconnect injector wiring harness at valve cover connection. Disconnect under valve cover harness connector from valve cover.
Remove heater hose clamp from support bracket at valve cover.
Disconnect manifold pressure sensor (map) wiring.
Remove crankcase ventilation pipe.
Remove valve/intake cover bolts and valve cover from vehicle, include mark studs for installation.
Drain oil/fuel supply manifold.
Remove injector wiring harness, include wire harness channel from injectors.
Remove electronic injector assembly.
Replace injector o-rings (set) (one set for one injector).
Clean all parts and mating surfaces.
Install electronic injector assembly, include torque bolts to spec.

note.para: Torque injector shoulder bolt prior to installing injector.

step1.para: Install injector wiring harness, include install harness channel to injectors.
Install oil/fuel supply manifold plug, include replace o-ring and torque to spec.
Install valve/intake cover to vehicle, include connect under valve cover wiring connector to valve cover.
Install valve/intake cover bolts. Torque bolts to spec.
Install crankcase ventilation pipe.
Connect manifold pressure sensor (MAP) wiring.
Connect injector wiring harness connector at valve cover.
Install alternator wiring support bracket to valve cover.
Connect alternator wiring to alternator and harness to valve cover and support clamps.
Install heater hose clamp to support bracket at valve cover.
Connect electronic engine controls wire harness to valve cover. Include tape plastic clip to harness.
Install air conditioning compressor assembly if applicable. Include connect support clamps, wire harness to clutch and compressor belt. Install plastic ties as required.
Connect surge tank hose (overflow), include connect coolant level sensor connector and strap harness to hose.
Connect charge air cooler outlet hose at cooler and at valve cover.
Connect battery to ground cable, include ECM ground.
Bleed diesel engine fuel, start engine, check for leaks and top off fluids.
Install engine housing cover, include install seat, shifter lever, cup holder, trim and floor mat as required.
Close hood and remove wheel chocks.
Check/test operation while road testing vehicle.
